name: Dapta Inc
description: Operator of a no-code platform intended to empower businesses to build, manage and deliver content. The company's platform offers a headless CMS to connect multiple data sources and expose API endpoints, a no-code tool to build API and allows for custom workflows to be developed on top of their platform, enabling SMBs to develop software faster and prevent them from reinventing the wheel.
one_liner: Operator of a no-code platform intended to empower businesses to build, manage and deliver content. The company's platform offers a headless CMS to connect multiple data sources and expose API endpoints, a no-code tool to build API and allows for custom workflows to be developed on top of their platform, enabling SMBs to develop software faster and prevent them from reinventing the wheel.
